definition: to indicate/to point out
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the monohydrate is not mentioned in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 值得指出的是，在本文献中没有提到一水化物。

sentences.english: Just show me one county where Dr. Sun's principles have been put in practice.
sentences.chinese: 你给我指出哪一个县实施了孙中山先生的三民主义？

sentences.english: Eventually it puts forward the focus of studying V-based solid solution type hydrogen stora…
sentences.chinese: 指出了今后钒基固溶体型贮氢材料应用研究的重点。

sentences.english: Mr Zorin says this kind of social engineering is the key to understanding today's problem.
sentences.chinese: 佐林指出这种社会工程是理解俄罗斯现有问题的关键。

sentences.english: And "sexsomnia" disorders are easily treated with medication, he added.
sentences.chinese: 申克还指出，性行为睡眠障碍用药物治疗很方便。

sentences.english: Shi Xing pain Chen interests, points out the consequences of the Japanese occupation of Korea will bring.
sentences.chinese: 石星痛陈利害，指出了日军占领朝鲜会带来的恶果。

sentences.english: This article explains the problems and countermeasures of the examples in CNKI system.
sentences.chinese: 指出了CNKI系统中存在的问题及对策。

sentences.english: Bokova that media facilities should not be the target of military operations.
sentences.chinese: 博科娃指出，媒体设施不应当成为军事行动的目标。

sentences.english: Connection among quasi-H closedness, weakly continuous mapping and compactness is also shown.
sentences.chinese: 并指出了拟H闭性与弱连续映射和紧性的联系。

sentences.english: It is point out that the fluctuation of structure function lead to nonlinear scaling law.
sentences.chinese: 指出结构函数的振荡涨落导致非线性标度律。

sentences.english: He points to other bars he considers better-looking.
sentences.chinese: 他给我指出一些他认为好看的。

sentences.english: The Russian Defense Ministry dismissed claims of the airport bombing as disinformation .
sentences.chinese: 俄国防部指出关于轰炸机场的消息并不属实。

sentences.english: Other good security characteristic of one-time pad is pointed out at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 同时指出一次一密体制依然具有很好的安全特性。

sentences.english: It is indicated that it is an interested problem on the use of polyester bottle in packing beer.
sentences.chinese: 指出研制灌装啤酒用聚酯瓶是近年的一个热门课题。

sentences.english: Critics argue this stunt is hostile to the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 批语家指出这样的惊人表演是对天主教堂的不敬重。

sentences.english: During his speech he pointed out the 3 root reasons for why Chinese are not good at communication.
sentences.chinese: 吴建民指出，“中国人不大会交流”有三个根本原因。

definition: to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to believe/to think/to consider/to feel
to emphasize (a statement)/to stress
to raise (an issue)/to propose/to put forward/to suggest/to post (on a website)/to withdraw (cash)
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
variant of 秤[cheng4]/steelyard
to weigh/to state/to name/name/appellation/to praise
to fit/balanced/suitable
to quote/to cite/to recommend (one's friend's, associates etc)
clear-cut/definite/explicit/to clarify/to specify/to make definite
to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known
to claim/to state/to proclaim/to assert
besides/in addition/moreover/furthermore
to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
to declare one's position/to say where one stands
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
in view of/seeing that/considering/whereas
to formulate/enunciation/to explain sth precisely
